CHLoop

Simulate spiking neural networks from spatial data

A new and easy to use toolchain for modeling and simulating realistic SNN.

Getting started Â»

Installation

mrg-chloop-blender:

Requirements:

Blender (>= 2.69)

mrg-chloop-nest:

Requirements:

Python 2.6.x or 2.7.x
